attributes.action: recognise the happiness that Daniel Cowen has brought to the women of North West and Central London since he hit puberty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Daniel Cowen is pretty cool. Did you know that he worked at Divertimenti for a day? The legal world's gain is the luxury kitchen retailing world's loss... But by signing this petition you will be making a small but important statement about how much Daniel Cowen means to you. I urge you to stand with us!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
